### Title: 
RISO Plumbing Services for Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre, St. John’s, NL

#### Languages:

* English: [E0224-232290](#)
* French: [E0224-232290 OCIR Services de plomberie](#)

#### Government Tender Announcement

This is a request for standing offer (RISO) for plumbing services at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre, located in St. John's, NL. Bids must be submitted on May 18, 2023, by 1400 EDT to be eligible. Contractors will be selected based on the lowest price.

#### Description:

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites potential suppliers to participate in a request for standing offer (RISO) plumbing services for the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre in St. John's, NL. The scope of work includes the provision of labour, supervision, transportation, and equipment necessary to perform the following services:

* Maintenance procedures
* Minor repairs
* Installation of plumbing systems

The term of this contract will be two (2) years and will be executed on an "as and when requested basis". The scope of the work program, the labor and material requirements, and the administration of this RISO will be defined in the Standing Offer Agreement.

Individual call-up amounts will vary up to a maximum of $25,000.00 (HST included).

#### Important details:

* The term of this standing offer will be two (2) years.
* Bid security is not a requirement for this tender.
* Canada does not guarantee that the full amount, or any amount, will be called up on any resulting RISO.
